Row.Text: Nubia Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Royal Bath and Astronomical Observatory in the same District. City gains a bonus to [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 5% of that City’s [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food.
City gains a bonus to [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 5% of that City’s [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food.
+3 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for Wonders. +10% Growth Rate. Nubia Unique Food Building. Ageless.
+3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Nubia Unique Science Building. Ageless.
+3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. Ageless. Must be built in Desert.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. [N]Must be built in Desert.

He created it as his monument for his father Amun-Re, lord of the Thrones of the Two Lands, in the fortress 'Slayer of the foreigners', making for him a resting place of eternity because he made the victories of My Majesty greater than those of any king who had been.
Gebel Barkal stela of Tuthmosis III
